TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BitmapMetadataBlob extends System.Object

summary.span: Proporciona un marcador de posición para los elementos de metadatos que no se pueden convertir de C# a un tipo de datos subyacente que conserva los metadatos.

span.span: Provides a placeholder for metadata items that cannot be converted from C# to an underlying data type that persists metadata.

summary.span: El blob se convierte en una matriz de bytes para conservar el contenido.

span.span: The blob is converted into an array of bytes to preserve the content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] admite los siguientes esquemas de metadatos de imagen: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], texto ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] datos textuales), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], y [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)].supports the following image metadata schemas: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], tEXt ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] Textual Data), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)].

related.span: Datos de texto de gráficos (texto) de especificación de portable de red

span.span: Portable Network Graphics Textual Data (tEXt) Specification

related.span: Información de esquema de prensa internacional de telecomunicaciones Consejo (IPTC)

span.span: International Press Telecommunications Council (IPTC) Schema Information

related.span: Plataforma de metadados Extensible (XMP) de Adobe
Especificación de EXIF (formato de archivo de imagen intercambiable)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(unsigned int8[] blob) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: Inicializa una instancia de y convierte los metadatos que contiene en una matriz de bytes para conservar su contenido.

span.span: Initializes an instance of and converts the metadata it holds into an array of bytes to persist its content.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] GetBlobValue() cil managed

summary.span: Devuelve una matriz de bytes que representa el valor de un objeto .

span.span: Returns an array of bytes that represents the value of a .
